price: 79. (Iblis) le dijo: “¡Señor!, concédeme un plazo de tiempo hasta el Día de la Resurrección”.
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ فَأَنظِرۡنِيٓ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ يُبۡعَثُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi fa-anẓir'nī ilā yawmi yub'ʿathūna
